title: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy view does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the 'Add Javadoc' action does not have any effect.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' action, the Javadoc should be added to the selected field.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the view. 3. Choose the 'Add Javadoc' action for the selected field.
